item.description:
If you have questions about this event, please contact Kelley below.

They are giving out free passes to the movie, but you must arrive early or you may not get a seat.

The Official Site for the movie is, http://www.theorphana... .

The movie is called The Orphanage, and it is a Spanish supernatural thriller, with English subtitles. It is rated R, and the director, Juan Antonio Bayona, and the screenwriter, Sergio Sanchez, will be present at the screening for a Q&A immediately following the film. If you would like to put this up on the meetup wall as an option for people to attend, I would love to send you an e-pass of the ticket to the movie. Thanks and if you have any questions, feel free to shoot me an email. The easiest way to get a hold of me is to email me at
kdaly@alliedadvpub.com.
Have a great day!
Kelley Daly
Allied Advertising

group.name: The Boston Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: Pelicula Gratis, Advance Screening: The Orphanage at Boston Common
